message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think you'd be interested in. I'm asking for $130 for it. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite ready to go down to $120 just yet. How about we split the difference and go with $125?  I'm confident this product will be worth it to you.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. How about we meet at $115? I'm willing to compromise, but I really want to get the best deal possible.
